page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: My grandad has lived in the village all of his life,about seventy years. He has got his own business.The shop is joined on to the house.He does Post Office work and sell's groceries and sweet's.He enjoy's his job. He has two children called Peter and Margaret.My grandad went to the village school. He owns a Volvo estate car.He used to go to Ashbourne on the train the line has now been closed.Now he get's in his car.He does his shopping in his own shop. He said that most of the village has changed.He thinks the village is a nice place and he would'nt like to move. My grandad has been to church only a few time's.He used to go to chapel which is now someone's house.He can remember about nine vicars
